newsitem.title: USA: CFX to acquire Community Bankshares.
newsitem.headline: CFX to acquire Community Bankshares.

text.p: CFX Corp said Monday it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire Community Bankshares Inc in an exchange of stock valued at $96 million.
The agreement calls for each outstanding Community share to be converted into 2.2 shares of CFX, it said.
If the average price of CFX common for the 15 trading days preceding the effective date of the merger is between $18.18 and $20, the exchange ratio will float between 2.2 and 2.0 CFX shares.
The ratio will be 2.0 if the average CFX stock price exceeds $20.
